headline: Rigid Packaging Market Size, Trends, Sustainable Innovations and Key Player Insights
summary: According to data published by Towards Packaging, a sister firm of Precedence Research, the global rigid packaging market will rise from USD 550.49 billion in 2025 to USD 1,020.61 billion by 2034, growing at a CAGR of 7.1%. The surge is fueled by increasing use of sustainable and innovative packaging materials, particularly in food, healthcare, and cosmetics industries, led by key players such as Amcor, Berry Plastics, and Sealed Air Corporation.Ottawa, Nov. 07, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The glob
